activities: Employee human resources data will be used for various human resources purposes, which will include the following: payroll processing, benefits administration, succession planning, promotions, bonus administration, etc.
contacttitle1: Vice President - Division General Counsel | Chief Compliance Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between CCI and an employee, CCI has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities (DPAs)to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles, as well as to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
